page.title: 10Steel Casting, Alston Moor
page.content: {Precision Products (Cumberland) Ltd. (now{employing}56 people), was established in 1948 to make small {precision castings}weighing from a few grams to 50kg., the first licensee of the{Shaw Process}which makes accurate, inert block ceramic moulds and is recognised as a{world leader}in this field. Casting includes carbon, alloy, stainless, tool and special steels.{Products}include parts for the petro-chemical pump industry (some being used in North Sea oil fields and others in the newly developed 'down the hole' pumps), mining machinery, power station generators, nuclear power industry, general engineering and stainless steel golf club heads. Castings are{exported}directly to North America and continental Europe. and indirectly all over the world.
